about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: My name is Gabriel Chaves, I was born and raised in Fortaleza, Ceará. From an early age, I developed a passion for computing, a passion that led me to explore various fields, from web page design to developing complex artificial intelligence models. I am passionate about what I do <3

list.title: SGR
list.description: An innovative system for managing and monitoring energy meters. Complete development of frontend, backend, and LoRaWAN communication with microcontrollers, using React and Chakra-UI on the frontend, and NestJS with clean architecture on the backend.

list.title: NTN
list.description: A system for monitoring via NTN (Non-Terrestrial Networks). Built a frontend with NextJS and Mantine-UI and a backend with NestJS following best practices and clean architecture, along with full integration with NTN networks.

list.title: IOB
list.description: A monitoring and management system for bovines. Worked as a volunteer developing the application's frontend using React, following the best industry practices.

list.title: GAAV – Military Police
list.description: An application for generating and validating PDFs via GOV.BR, using Flutter and storing data with Firebase.

list.title: SINCRO
list.description: A system for silo management with data capture and display on a dashboard. Frontend built with Flutter Web and backend with Springboot.
